message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I believe I can't pay more than $12,000 for it. Can we negotiate closer to my budget?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can't pay more than $12,000 for the product. Can we find a middle ground closer to my budget?
